headline: CHMP Backs EU Approval of MRNA's New COVID-19 Vaccine mNexspike
summary: CHMP backs EU approval of Moderna's next-generation mNexspike COVID-19 vaccine, with a final European Commission decision expected shortly.

raw.headline: CHMP Backs EU Approval of MRNA's New COVID-19 Vaccine mNexspike
raw.summary: CHMP backs EU approval of Moderna's next-generation mNexspike COVID-19 vaccine, with a final European Commission decision expected shortly.

headline: Moderna (MRNA) Is Up 5.9% After EMA Backs New mNEXSPIKE Vaccine - Has The Bull Case Changed?
summary: The European Medicines Agency’s Committee for Medicinal Products for Human Use previously issued a positive opinion recommending marketing authorization of Moderna’s new COVID-19 vaccine, mNEXSPIKE (mRNA-1283), for individuals aged 12 and older, following Phase 3 data showing higher relative efficacy versus Spikevax. This potential EU approval would broaden Moderna’s respiratory vaccine lineup and regional footprint, partly counterbalancing pressure from weakening COVID-19 vaccine...

This potential EU approval would broaden Moderna’s respiratory vaccine lineup and regional footprint, partly counterbalancing pressure from weakening COVID-19 vaccine...

headline: ‘Zombie’ biotech buyer Xoma to acquire Generation Bio
summary: The gene therapy developer has lost most of its value since going public in 2020 and saw a long road ahead for a delivery technology that had shown promise in preclinical tests.
